tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(255),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_address VARCHAR(255),
    destination_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE security_events(
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_time TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_details JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE siem_alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_name VARCHAR(255),
    alert_description TEXT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES siem_events(event_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE siem_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(20),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(20),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE threat_indicators (
    indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_type VARCHAR(50),
    indicator_value VARCHAR(100),
    indicator_score INT,
    threat_level VARCHAR(20),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE siem_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE threat_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE siem_correlations (
    correlation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    correlation_type VARCHAR(50),
    correlation_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_id INT,
    destination_id INT
)
